subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* [[𣥂]]
* [[龰]] (when used as a bottom radical)

Note that [[龰]] may also be a component of the radicals [[疋]] ([[𤴓]]/[[𤴔]]), [[辵]] ([[辶]]), [[走]], and [[足]] ([[⻊]]/[[𧾷]]).
